column6:
Full moon's out, so guess who's comin' to bug our webslinger? WEREWOLF BY NIGHT! And he's turned Peter Parker's rival, Flash Thompson, into a werewolf too! Can Spidey find a cure before the sun comes up, or is Flash forever doomed to a life of fleas and howling at the moon?,2006,7
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | writer:Peter David | inker:Norman Lee | penciller:Mike Norton | letterer:Dave Sharpe | penciller (cover):Cameron Stewart
